mean_en: activity in which someone buys and sells things (such as stocks or pieces of property) in the hope of making a large profit but with the risk of a large loss
word_etyma: speculat思考，投机 + ion名词后缀 → speculation 思考，投机
sentence: His risky speculation made him a lot of money.
sentence_trans: 他的冒险投机让他赚了一大笔钱。
